channel.title: Help with Lunar
channel.description:
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=22419&highlight=Lunar]http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=22419&highlight=Lunar[/url]
I'm using Choob Isle source and need help with the part where it says find: "RefreshSummonBook" instead my server has a music list,and I can't find the music list. Any help? I'm basically replacing music book to Lunar Tab instead of Summon Book to Lunar Tab. Any help appreciated been working on this for hours. Oh and nvm my post count lol, I've been around private servers for about a year, and know basic C++ and Java. Thank you for your time. :)
